# SiGN

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Overview

An R package that implements the Signals for Good News (SiGN) model to compute behavioural predictions in common operant choice paradigms.

## Installation

You can install the development version of SiGN from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("jpisklak/SiGN")
```
